thread.title: Ground News - Top weather events of 2023: Lack of snow
thread.title_full: Ground News - Top weather events of 2023: Lack of snow

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Top weather events of 2023: Lack of snow
text:
Summary by Ground News On Jan. 24, several tornadoes formed in Southeast Texas. One of them prompted the National Weather Service office Houston/Galveston to declare its first Tornado Emergency. Nearly 700 homes were damaged, with more than 400 of these homes sustaining major damage. The tornado, rated an EF-3, had a path length of 18.7 miles, an estimated maximum peak wind of 140 mph.
